name: Two Hearts "DEMO" (Chapter I)
description:
Done by: Tensai.

WARNING!: STRONG LANGUAGE AND SCENES, VIEWER DISCRETION IS ADVISED...

WARNING 2: ANY TYPOS AND SPELLING MISTAKES WILL BE FIXED, DON'T WORRY

This Is my test demo for the visual novel "2 Hearts", It will get updates and what not, like getting sounds, windows versions and tons more! Thanks for helping! Donate If you like what you see so far!

Also when characters like "The black haired girl" pop on screen they have voices! If you want to hear her voice lines just wait a bit while her text is being displayed (It may take long for slow internet connections"

If you like the project you can donate!
